channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CrowdStrike Bets On AI Agents To Outpace Cyber Adversaries
item.description: At Fal.Con 2025, CrowdStrike launched Threat AI and Risk-Based Patching, advancing the agentic SOC with unified data, AI agents, and precision defense...

item.title: Some Cars’ Owner’s Manuals Run Longer Than A Novel (But Remain A Must-Read)
item.description: The Mercedes-Benz G-Class SUV is the thickest among them, taking the average motorist around 13 hours to read.

item.title: Will Autonomy Break AI Agents? Here Are The Likely Scenarios

item.title: Workday Tracks Evolution Of Human (Agentic) Resources

item.title: NYT Connections Sports Today: Hints, Answers For Thursday, September 18
item.description: Looking for some help with today's NYT Connections Sports Edition? Some hints and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak...

item.title: Increasing the dosage
item.description: If you’re taking the wrong medication, that’s not going to help. It doesn’t matter how fast you’re going if you’re headed in the wrong direction.

item.title: Before we learn a new skill
item.description: The pre-work involves important choices: Skip these steps and you might as well not bother to begin.

item.title: New post

item.title: Often give in

item.title: Kinds of reckless
